page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The main employers of labour in the area offering permanent jobs are small{building contractors}and {farmers.}The{hotels, restaurants}and other establishments concerned with tourism usually offer only temporary, part-time work for perhaps three months of the year, which is generally taken up by women. A number of people are{self-employed,}and these offer a variety of services such as{gardening, {boat maintenance, welding, general {house maintenance, etc. But such jobs in so sparsely populated an area are limited. The majority of employed people travel outside the area for their work. The nearest large employers to Coverack are the{British {Telecom Satellite Communications {Centre on Goonhilly Downs, five miles away, and the{Royal Naval Air Station at Culdrose, eight miles distant.
